snippet.title: Tuna Tortellini Pasta Salad
snippet.description: This Tuna Tortellini Pasta Salad is a delicious change of pace from a standard tuna salad. Line your serving bowl with salad greens and garnish with Parmesan cheese curls made by 'peeling' a piece of Parmesan cheese with a vegetable peeler.

snippet.title: Orange and Grape Tortellini Salad
snippet.description: Mandarin oranges and grapes pair perfectly with cheese tortellini in this cool and refreshing pasta salad.

snippet.title: Cheese Tortellini Caesar Salad
snippet.description: Cheese Tortellini Caesar Salad is a delicious combination of complementary flavors. You'll enjoy the creamy tangy Caesar dressing in this recipe. Ready in just a few minutes, this pasta salad is perfect as an appetizer or main entrée.

snippet.title: Layered Mediterranean Tortellini Salad
snippet.description: Guests will love discovering all the layers in this Layered Mediterranean Tortellini Salad. This combination of cheese filled pasta, cherry tomatoes, shredded fresh basil, artichokes hearts and olives will add elegance and rich flavors to your summer entertaining.

snippet.title: Spinach Cheese Tortellini Salad
snippet.description: This versatile Spinach Cheese Tortellini Salad is at home as a main course for four or serve smaller portions as a unique salad with your favorite entrée.

snippet.title: Tuscan Tortellini & Melon Salad
snippet.description: This refreshing, Tuscan-inspired salad features cheese-filled tortellini paired perfectly with a colorful combination of prosciutto, cantaloupe and honeydew melons.

snippet.title: Pesto Tortellini Salad with Grape Tomatoes
snippet.description: This Pesto Tortellini Salad with Grape Tomatoes is perfect as an appetizer or a main entrée for any meal all year long. Add other vegetables for more color!

snippet.title: Tortellini Salad Italiana
snippet.description: Tortellini Salad Italiana features tender pasta, colorful vegetables and fresh mozzarella cheese balls in a contemporary version of an Italian classic. This is a feast for the eyes and the mouth!

snippet.title: Tortellini and Shrimp Caesar Salad
snippet.description: Tortellini and Shrimp Caesar Salad is for the seafood lovers in your family. Shrimp and tortellini take the classic Caesar salad to new heights.

snippet.title: Chilled Three Cheese Tortellini Toss
snippet.description: Balsamic vinegar and olive oil salad dressing pairs perfectly with al dente three cheese tortellini for a true taste of Italy in this colorful chilled tossed pasta salad.
